greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of asymmetric types of Boolean functions of n variables under action of complementing group C(n,2).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..11
Index entries for sequences related to Boolean functions
formula: a(n) = 1/(2^n)*Sum_{j=0..n} (-1)^j*2^(C(j, 2))*[ n, j ]*2^(2^(n-j)), j=0..n), where [ n, j ] is Gaussian 2-binomial coefficient.
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_
